questions.question: What is a Healthy Watershed?
answers: A healthy watershed is one in which natural land cover supports: dynamic hydrologic and geomorphologic processes within their natural range of variation
A healthy watershed is one in which natural land cover supports a habitat of sufficient size and connectivity to support native aquatic and riparian species
A healthy watershed is one in which natural land cover supports: physical and chemical water quality conditions able to support healthy biological communities

questions.question: Do Watersheds Need to Be Protected?
Nothing is happening to protect the watershed
